00035  SUBROUTINE MemAlloc(FLAG)
00036 
00037 !  Common Variables
00038  USE Domain
00039  USE FluidParams, ONLY : phi
00040  USE LBMParams,   ONLY : f, fdim, g, gdim
00041  USE MPIParams
00042  IMPLICIT NONE
00043 
00044  !   Input/Output Parameters
00045  INTEGER, INTENT (IN) :: FLAG
00046 
00047  IF(FLAG == 1) THEN
00048 
00049 ! Near neighbors and order parameter arrays
00050  ALLOCATE(  ni(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,zlg:zug,1:6) )
00051  ALLOCATE( phi(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,zlg:zug) )
00052 
00053 ! Distribution function arrays
00054  ALLOCATE( f(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,zlg:zug,0:fdim,0:1) )
00055  ALLOCATE( g(xlg:xug,ylg:yug,zlg:zug,0:gdim,0:1) )
00056 
00057 ! Allocation for data exchange in the x direction
00058    xsize  = (yu - yl + 1)*(zu - zl + 1)
00059    xsize2 = xsize + xsize
00060    xsize3 = xsize2 + xsize
00061    xsize4 = xsize3 + xsize
00062    xsize5 = xsize4 + xsize
00063 
00064    ALLOCATE( phi_west_snd(1:xsize) )
00065    ALLOCATE( phi_east_snd(1:xsize) )
00066    ALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv(1:xsize) )
00067    ALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv(1:xsize) )
00068    
00069    ALLOCATE( f_west_snd(1:xsize) )
00070    ALLOCATE( f_east_snd(1:xsize) )
00071    ALLOCATE( f_west_rcv(1:xsize) )
00072    ALLOCATE( f_east_rcv(1:xsize) )
00073 
00074    ALLOCATE( g_west_snd(1:xsize5) )
00075    ALLOCATE( g_east_snd(1:xsize5) )
00076    ALLOCATE( g_west_rcv(1:xsize5) )
00077    ALLOCATE( g_east_rcv(1:xsize5) )
00078 
00079 ! Allocation for data exchange in the y direction
00080    ysize  = (xu - xl + 1)*(zu - zl + 1)
00081    ysize2 = ysize + ysize
00082    ysize3 = ysize2 + ysize
00083    ysize4 = ysize3 + ysize
00084    ysize5 = ysize4 + ysize
00085 
00086    ALLOCATE( phi_south_snd(1:ysize) )
00087    ALLOCATE( phi_north_snd(1:ysize) )
00088    ALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv(1:ysize) )
00089    ALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv(1:ysize) )
00090 
00091    ALLOCATE( f_south_snd(1:ysize) )
00092    ALLOCATE( f_north_snd(1:ysize) )
00093    ALLOCATE( f_south_rcv(1:ysize) )
00094    ALLOCATE( f_north_rcv(1:ysize) )
00095 
00096    ALLOCATE( g_south_snd(1:ysize5) )
00097    ALLOCATE( g_north_snd(1:ysize5) )
00098    ALLOCATE( g_south_rcv(1:ysize5) )
00099    ALLOCATE( g_north_rcv(1:ysize5) )
00100 
00101 ! Allocation for data exchanged in the y direction
00102    zsize  = (xu - xl + 1)*(yu - yl + 1)
00103    zsize2 = zsize + zsize
00104    zsize3 = zsize2 + zsize
00105    zsize4 = zsize3 + zsize
00106    zsize5 = zsize4 + zsize
00107 
00108    ALLOCATE( phi_bot_snd(1:zsize) )
00109    ALLOCATE( phi_top_snd(1:zsize) )
00110    ALLOCATE( phi_bot_rcv(1:zsize) )
00111    ALLOCATE( phi_top_rcv(1:zsize) )
00112 
00113    ALLOCATE( f_bot_snd(1:zsize) )
00114    ALLOCATE( f_bot_rcv(1:zsize) )
00115    ALLOCATE( f_top_snd(1:zsize) )
00116    ALLOCATE( f_top_rcv(1:zsize) )
00117 
00118    ALLOCATE( g_bot_snd(1:zsize5) )
00119    ALLOCATE( g_bot_rcv(1:zsize5) )
00120    ALLOCATE( g_top_snd(1:zsize5) )
00121    ALLOCATE( g_top_rcv(1:zsize5) )
00122 
00123 ! Allocation for data exchange in edges along the x direction
00124    xedge = xu - xl + 1
00125 
00126    ALLOCATE( phi_tn_snd(1:xedge) )
00127    ALLOCATE( phi_ts_snd(1:xedge) )
00128    ALLOCATE( phi_bn_snd(1:xedge) )
00129    ALLOCATE( phi_bs_snd(1:xedge) )
00130    ALLOCATE( phi_tn_rcv(1:xedge) )
00131    ALLOCATE( phi_ts_rcv(1:xedge) )
00132    ALLOCATE( phi_bn_rcv(1:xedge) )
00133    ALLOCATE( phi_bs_rcv(1:xedge) )
00134    
00135    ALLOCATE( g_tn_snd(1:xedge) )
00136    ALLOCATE( g_ts_snd(1:xedge) )
00137    ALLOCATE( g_bn_snd(1:xedge) )
00138    ALLOCATE( g_bs_snd(1:xedge) )
00139    ALLOCATE( g_tn_rcv(1:xedge) )
00140    ALLOCATE( g_ts_rcv(1:xedge) )
00141    ALLOCATE( g_bn_rcv(1:xedge) )
00142    ALLOCATE( g_bs_rcv(1:xedge) )
00143 
00144 ! Allocation for data exchange in edges along the y direction
00145    yedge = yu - yl + 1
00146 
00147    ALLOCATE( phi_te_snd(1:yedge) )
00148    ALLOCATE( phi_tw_snd(1:yedge) )
00149    ALLOCATE( phi_be_snd(1:yedge) )
00150    ALLOCATE( phi_bw_snd(1:yedge) )
00151    ALLOCATE( phi_te_rcv(1:yedge) )
00152    ALLOCATE( phi_tw_rcv(1:yedge) )
00153    ALLOCATE( phi_be_rcv(1:yedge) )
00154    ALLOCATE( phi_bw_rcv(1:yedge) )
00155 
00156    ALLOCATE( g_te_snd(1:yedge) )
00157    ALLOCATE( g_tw_snd(1:yedge) )
00158    ALLOCATE( g_be_snd(1:yedge) )
00159    ALLOCATE( g_bw_snd(1:yedge) )
00160    ALLOCATE( g_te_rcv(1:yedge) )
00161    ALLOCATE( g_tw_rcv(1:yedge) )
00162    ALLOCATE( g_be_rcv(1:yedge) )
00163    ALLOCATE( g_bw_rcv(1:yedge) )
00164 
00165 ! Allocation for data exchange in edges along the z direction
00166    zedge = zu - zl + 1
00167 
00168    ALLOCATE( phi_ne_snd(1:zedge) )
00169    ALLOCATE( phi_nw_snd(1:zedge) )
00170    ALLOCATE( phi_se_snd(1:zedge) )
00171    ALLOCATE( phi_sw_snd(1:zedge) )
00172    ALLOCATE( phi_ne_rcv(1:zedge) )
00173    ALLOCATE( phi_nw_rcv(1:zedge) )
00174    ALLOCATE( phi_se_rcv(1:zedge) )
00175    ALLOCATE( phi_sw_rcv(1:zedge) )
00176 
00177    ALLOCATE( g_ne_snd(1:zedge) )
00178    ALLOCATE( g_nw_snd(1:zedge) )
00179    ALLOCATE( g_se_snd(1:zedge) )
00180    ALLOCATE( g_sw_snd(1:zedge) )
00181    ALLOCATE( g_ne_rcv(1:zedge) )
00182    ALLOCATE( g_nw_rcv(1:zedge) )
00183    ALLOCATE( g_se_rcv(1:zedge) )
00184    ALLOCATE( g_sw_rcv(1:zedge) )
00185 
00186  ELSE
00187    DEALLOCATE( ni )
00188    DEALLOCATE( phi )
00189    DEALLOCATE( f )
00190    DEALLOCATE( g )
00191    DEALLOCATE( f_west_snd )
00192    DEALLOCATE( f_west_rcv )
00193    DEALLOCATE( f_east_snd )
00194    DEALLOCATE( f_east_rcv )
00195    DEALLOCATE( g_west_snd )
00196    DEALLOCATE( g_east_snd )
00197    DEALLOCATE( g_west_rcv )
00198    DEALLOCATE( g_east_rcv )
00199    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_snd )
00200    DEALLOCATE( phi_west_rcv )
00201    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_snd )
00202    DEALLOCATE( phi_east_rcv )
00203    DEALLOCATE( f_south_snd )
00204    DEALLOCATE( f_south_rcv )
00205    DEALLOCATE( f_north_snd )
00206    DEALLOCATE( f_north_rcv )
00207    DEALLOCATE( g_south_snd )
00208    DEALLOCATE( g_north_snd )
00209    DEALLOCATE( g_south_rcv )
00210    DEALLOCATE( g_north_rcv )
00211    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_snd )
00212    DEALLOCATE( phi_south_rcv )
00213    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_snd )
00214    DEALLOCATE( phi_north_rcv )
00215    DEALLOCATE( f_bot_snd )
00216    DEALLOCATE( f_bot_rcv )
00217    DEALLOCATE( f_top_snd )
00218    DEALLOCATE( f_top_rcv )
00219    DEALLOCATE( g_bot_snd )
00220    DEALLOCATE( g_bot_rcv )
00221    DEALLOCATE( g_top_snd )
00222    DEALLOCATE( g_top_rcv )
00223    DEALLOCATE( phi_bot_snd )
00224    DEALLOCATE( phi_bot_rcv )
00225    DEALLOCATE( phi_top_snd )
00226    DEALLOCATE( phi_top_rcv )
00227    DEALLOCATE( phi_tn_snd )
00228    DEALLOCATE( phi_ts_snd )
00229    DEALLOCATE( phi_te_snd )
00230    DEALLOCATE( phi_tw_snd )
00231    DEALLOCATE( phi_bn_snd )
00232    DEALLOCATE( phi_bs_snd )
00233    DEALLOCATE( phi_be_snd )
00234    DEALLOCATE( phi_bw_snd )
00235    DEALLOCATE( phi_ne_snd )
00236    DEALLOCATE( phi_nw_snd )
00237    DEALLOCATE( phi_se_snd )
00238    DEALLOCATE( phi_sw_snd ) 
00239    DEALLOCATE( phi_tn_rcv )
00240    DEALLOCATE( phi_ts_rcv )
00241    DEALLOCATE( phi_te_rcv )
00242    DEALLOCATE( phi_tw_rcv )
00243    DEALLOCATE( phi_bn_rcv )
00244    DEALLOCATE( phi_bs_rcv )
00245    DEALLOCATE( phi_be_rcv )
00246    DEALLOCATE( phi_bw_rcv )
00247    DEALLOCATE( phi_ne_rcv )
00248    DEALLOCATE( phi_nw_rcv )
00249    DEALLOCATE( phi_se_rcv )
00250    DEALLOCATE( phi_sw_rcv )
00251 
00252  END IF
00253 
00254  RETURN
00255  END SUBROUTINE MemAlloc
